roleset.name: to argue
roleset.note: BICKER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'bicker' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from bicker.01-v predicate notes)
BICKERING-N NOTES: Roleset based on BOLT P01. Comparison to verb entry bicker.01, which maps to 36.4-1. FrameNet Quarreling. (from bickering.01-n)

roles.note: Differs from verb entry bicker.01 because this roleset conflated the two bickerers. (from bickering.01-n)

example.name: intransitive
example.text: So far , instead of [*-1] teaming up , GE Capital staffers and Kidder investment bankers have bickered .
example.arg: GE Capital staffers and Kidder investment bankers

example.name: All args
example.text: I honestly don't understand how any man could choose to get involved in his wife's bickering with her girlfriend over shoes and a dog.
